caption:
Indulge in the perfect balance of sweet and savory with @palmrosetable’s Dark Chocolate Balsamic Figs Grazing Platter — featuring our Metabolism Super Powder.

This grazing platter brings together figs, grapes, black plums, olives, almonds (or pistachios), balsamic vinegar, cashew cheez and a chocolate-y twist. The rich dark chocolate sauce is infused with hints of cacao, almond, orange blossom, vanilla bean + our Metabolism Super Powder for an extra digestion boost. 

 Here’s how to make this decadent, gut-healthy grazing platter:
• Melt dark chocolate chips in a double boiler and whisk in Sakara Metabolism Super Powder + olive oil until smooth. Add vanilla bean, cinnamon, and almond orgeat syrup. Dip the figs in the chocolate and let set in the fridge.
• Enjoy the figs on their own or with a touch of balsamic. For a creamy texture, serve at room temp or keep them cold for a chocolate shell.
• Build a grazing platter with figs, seasonal fruit, nuts, cheez, and more for a stunning spread.
